about_the_game:
Introduces a new ship to the competition that is unlocked automatically when you download the DLC (no Experience Points required to unlock).



The ship comes in 3 variants:

IGNITATION 2.0

| Speed: 6 | Handling: 8 | Durability: 9 | Energy: 10 |

IGNITATION 3.0

| Speed: 7 | Handling: 6 | Durability: 7 | Energy: 9 |

IGNITATION 4.0

| Speed: 8 | Handling: 7 | Durability: 5 | Energy: 7 |

Take note: After downloading the DLC you will find the new ship at the end of the ships list!
